title: Judge voices concerns about Trump's Alien Enemies Act deportations
shortDescription: A judge who has temporarily blocked Trump's deportation of Venezuelans voiced concern about the breadth of how the Alien Enemies Act could be applied.

title: DOJ wants judge in law firm case booted, escalating attack on courts
shortDescription: The Justice Department wants the judge in law firm Perkins Coie's case against the Trump administration to be removed.

title: Trump announces $20 billion contract with Boeing for F-47 fighter jet
shortDescription: In a Friday press briefing inside of the Oval Office, President Donald Trump announced the coveted contract award for the new jet is going to Boeing.

title: President Trump unveils new F-47 fighter jet
shortDescription: In a press briefing inside the Oval Office, President Trump, announced the contract award to Boeing to develop a new F-47 fighter jet.

title: Trump defends the release of Social Security numbers in JFK files
shortDescription: President Donald Trump is defending the release of Social Security numbers that were made public through the JFK files.

title: Trump moves student loan management to Small Business Administration
shortDescription: The Small Business Administration will take over managing student loans, Trump says

title: Law firm Paul Weiss makes deal with Trump to escape executive order
shortDescription: The firm agreed to provide pro bono work for causes chosen by Trump and to change its workplace diversity practices, the White House said.

title: Next-gen 'Beast': GM to build Trump's new presidential limo
shortDescription: The Secret Service said on X that the director met with GM “to discuss advancements that could benefit the next generation of armored SUVs.”

title: AOC knocks Trump, Musk at ASU rally with Bernie Sanders
shortDescription: The progressive stars stopped in Tempe on their national tour against "authoritarianism and oligarchy," challenging President Trump and Elon Musk.

title: Trump Cabinet discusses keeping Venezuelan removal info secret: DOJ
shortDescription: Trump's Cabinet is discussing whether to invoke a state-secrets privilege to avoid revealing info on Venezuelan deportations, which a judge demanded.

title: White House begins review of agency plans for more mass layoffs
shortDescription: White House officials are reviewing agency downsizing plans, a move expected to lead to firing thousands of federal workers within the coming weeks.

title: Trump demands Supreme Court's John Roberts rein in judges
shortDescription: In a social media post, President Trump demanded the Supreme Court order lower court judges not to issue nationwide injunctions.

title: Trump signs order aimed at dismantling Department of Education
shortDescription: Plus: What can we expect from a travel ban? | U.S. judge blocks Elon Musk's DOGE from accessing Social Security records.

title: Trump DOGE executive claims $1.5 billion savings from IRS techn budget
shortDescription: The true size and legality of many DOGE-related cuts in government spending have been challenged in court.

title: White House preps new mass layoffs: Updates
shortDescription: The Trump administration says it expects to finish paying about $671 million owed to foreign aid organizations for completed work on Friday.

title: Trump administration abused immigration laws with Khalil's arrest, Democratic senators say
shortDescription: A group of eight Democratic Senators on Friday accused the Trump administration of abusing immigration laws in arresting student Mahmoud Khalil.

title: Trump approval ratings: What Americans think after 2 busy months
shortDescription: Donald Trump has bulldozed through the first two months of his second presidency. Here's what Americans think of his job so far.

title: Trump says they're hardened gang members. Evidence is thin.
shortDescription: President Trump has warned that deportees are among the most dangerous in the world, but their biggest crime may be having the wrong tattoo.

title: Trump's travel ban 2.0 is coming soon. Who will it affect?
shortDescription: Top leaders in foreign affairs and homeland security must submit a report on banning certain foreign nationals by Friday.
